title: Firefox locks up every time I attempt to use passkey
content:
I had this issue a few months ago but it then seemed to resolve itself. Now it's back.

I use passkey on a few sites like Google, Youtube, Hubspot... every time I attempt to use passkey on such sites Firefox locks up and I can't select anything on the page, a different tab. It just completely locks up and I have to restart it.

I always deselect cookies.

I don't have this issue on Safari so it is the only way I have to deal with this issue.
creator: jock3

title: Website not working in firefox
content: If you're unable to access your website on Firefox desktop, try these steps: - Clear cache and cookies in Firefox to remove any outdated or corrupted data. - Disable extensions or test in Safe Mode to check for conflicts. - Ensure HTTPS usage and verify there are no mixed content issues (HTTP elements on an HTTPS site), as Firefox may block them.

title: Roboform Add-on
content:
Hi,

For the last 2 weeks or so Roboform task bar has not displayed on firefox. It works perfectly OK with Edge. I tried uninstalling and then reinstalling roboform without closing roboform and miraculously the task bar appeared attached to the bottom of the screen for the duration of the session. I thought the problem was fixed however, when I next restarted the PC it was again not present. Any ideas how to fix this as I do not wish to use edge.
